component.text: The way we learn is supported by courseware delivered over the data network.
Students in different locations can work together on documents and speak together while they work.
Updated maintenance instructions are downloaded to a PDA at the time they are needed.
In addition to supporting courseware, data networks support administration, enrollment, and teacher-student communication.

Students at remote locations can access the same resources as those available on campus.
This course is distributed over the network and the content is enhanced by links to other resources, which are also on the network.
An administrator publishes the course catalog to a web site.
A student enrolls in classes from home.
A text message is sent from an instructor telling students that the next class is in the lab.

Updated Maintenance Instructions:

1. Valve 1 pressure: 230 psi
2. Valve 2 pressure: 230 psi
3. Valve 3 pressure: 230 psi
